TopicTitle: vessel trajectories changing if not in control

Articles.Content:
new save under updated version. launch my space station core, decouple and change control to fuel stage for deorbit maneuvers. time warp to node, notice my space station trajectory or "orbit" will "shift" over to the right side making the AP raise and PE lower.  these orbits in the screenshot were the same before the shift.

 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/i1ci9htipixf96u/ksp2 orbit issue.PNG?dl=0
